title: Science Inquiry Project Utilizing PDA: Convergence of Technology and Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific knowledge and experience with mobile device usage
context.additional_context: Learners participate in field data collection and analysis using personal PDAs or smartphones, conducting team projects for scientific phenomenon exploration

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect and analyze scientific experiment data using a PDA.
Learners can complete collaborative projects to solve scientific problems using PDA-based tools.
Learners can make data-driven decisions in technology-integrated learning environments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
